text: I want to help this project but I don't know what are the features that you've in mind! There is some way to we talk or list that describe what must be done?
title: How to help?

text:
Hi, @felipevolpone 
You can always start with tests coverage.
Server commands have not been tested fully and we need some tests to, atleast, be sure that there are no typos.

As for new features -- I need to think it over.

Hey @popravich, sounds great! 
I'm thinking to use unittest and py.test to start the process to coverage the library. It's ok?

@felipevolpone no py.test please.
Just use

```
$ make cov
```

for running coverage tool

-1 for py.test
We already have unittests and just a bit custom script to run them.
You can run tests with `make test` or `make cov` commands, or
directly by running `python3 runtest.py`
Most library code is covered with tests, only [ServerCommandsMixin](https://github.com/aio-libs/aioredis/blob/master/aioredis/commands/server.py) is not tested well.
